text: The Army University is a professional military education university system of the United States Army. It is the largest professional military education system in the world with over 150,000 soldiers educated in more than 88 occupations across its worldwide network of 70 schools. Approximately 25% of its curriculum is currently accredited, primarily for officer training, however initiatives are underway to accredit all enlisted training as well. == See also == * Air University * Marine Corps University *Texas A&M; University System == References == Category:Education government agencies of the United States Category:Department of Defense Education Activity Category:Public university systems in the United States Category:Military education and training Category:Military education and training in the United States Category:2015 establishments in the United States
title: Army University
